evidence.claim: MeaeCare utilizes AWS Lambda for serverless computing.
The platform follows HIPAA compliance guidelines in its architecture.
MeaeCare supports HL7 and FHIR standards for healthcare data exchange.
MeaeCare integrates with EHRs using REST APIs and webhooks.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of handling X12 or EDI transactions on the website.
